articles.title: Video: John Kasich has advice for Joe Biden on how to deal with GOP - CNN Video
articles.description: Former Republican Ohio governor and CNN political commentator John Kasich reacts to President Biden's strong rhetoric towards the GOP during a speech on gun violence and his comments on the January 6th insurrection.

articles.title: This piece of plastic can turn almost any gun into a machine gun  - CNN Video
articles.description: They are the size of a Lego, come in colors of the rainbow and, in seconds, can turn a semi-automatic weapon into a machine gun. CNN's Drew Griffin reports on the illegal conversion devices, called auto sears or switches.

articles.author: Scott Glover and Curt Devine
articles.title: Automatic weapons are 'everywhere,' and this machine gun adapter may be to blame
articles.description: The number of shootings involving automatic weapons in the US has skyrocketed in recent years, suggesting a troubling resurgence in the use of machine guns by criminals, according to an analysis provided exclusively to CNN.

articles.author: Analysis by Zachary B. Wolf, CNN
articles.title: Analysis: Everyone knew Jackson's water crisis was coming
articles.description: While drought has parched the West and threatens the region's water supply, in Jackson, Mississippi, it's deluge that's overwhelmed the water system and threatens normal life. What's shocking is that this is becoming a routine occurrence in Jackson.
articles.content:
A version of this story appears in CNN's What Matters newsletter. To get it in your inbox, sign up for free here.

articles.author: Sandee LaMotte, CNN
articles.title: Common steroids used for asthma, allergies linked to brain decline, study finds
articles.description: Both oral and inhaled glucocorticoids used for asthma, allergies and other inflammatory conditions may be linked to decreased white matter, which limits connectivity between different regions of the brain, a new study finds.
articles.content: Tree and grass pollen -- the main causes of spring allergies -- can blow into your house if you open your windows even a crack, "especially during the early morning hours, when tree pollen counts are… [+350 chars]

articles.author: Tim Lister, CNN
articles.title: Mikhail Gorbachev, Soviet president who took down the Iron Curtain, dies
articles.description: Mikhail Gorbachev, the last president of the Soviet Union before its dissolution, has died in Moscow at the age of 92, according to official statements.
articles.content:
(CNN)Mikhail Gorbachev, the last president of the Soviet Union before its dissolution, has died in Moscow at the age of 92, according to official statements.

articles.author: Jennifer Gray, CNN meteorologist
articles.title: A prolonged and record heat wave builds over the West this week
articles.description: Some of the hottest temperatures of the year are on the way for the West Coast and possibly staying dangerously hot through Labor Day as a mega heat wave builds in for the long term.
articles.content:
#Hoquiam tied record high today with 84°, which was last set in 2007. Record highs are possible on Tuesday.
Record highs for 8/30Sea-Tac Airport: 88° in 1987Olympia: 93° in 1944Bellingham: 85° in 19… [+125 chars]

articles.author: Nathaniel Meyersohn, CNN Business
articles.title: Kohl's and Gap have a surprising plan for this season's unsold clothing
articles.description: Retailers are overstocked on clothing, and some are packing it away in hopes of selling it in future seasons.

articles.author: Elizabeth Wolfe
articles.title: Investigators are still working to figure out why a shooter killed 2 people at an Oregon Safeway. Here's what we know
articles.description: As shoppers at a grocery in Bend, Oregon, meandered down aisles and considered produce choices Sunday night, a 20-year-old gunman burst into the Safeway store and began firing, killing two people and injuring at least two others.

articles.author: Dakin Andone and Raja Razek, CNN
articles.title: A gunman clad in tactical gear and armed with a semi-automatic rifle killed 2 and injured 5 others in Phoenix shooting, police say
articles.description: A gunman who killed two people and injured five others -- including two police officers -- in Phoenix on Sunday was armed with a semi-automatic rifle and wearing tactical gear, according to authorities.
